general_advisory: It is advisable to plant wheat, rice, and maize in the given weather conditions.

advisory: Sow wheat seeds at a depth of 2 inches.
Give nitrogenous fertilizers based on soil test reports.
Maintain water levels in paddy fields to avoid drowning the plants.
Use organic fertilizers for better soil health.
Plant maize in well-drained soil for optimal growth.
Monitor maize for pests and take appropriate measures.
